description: Miss Dissolved and Anika are left alone and although they have strict instructions not to play with each other they simply cannot refrain. Gently caressing, kissing and fucking each other with the constant fear of being discovered by their mistress, Miss Velour. Who knows what will happen if she finds them...
title: Lashings For Lust Part 1: Miss Velour, Dissolved, and Veronika Toft
